summary: The document is a National Agency Check Request form for Manuel Marti, dated June 1968, associated with the JFK Assassination System and involving military intelligence (INSCOM/CSF). It contains detailed personal information such as birth details, residences, and employment history, along with a security clearance check. Originally classified, it was later released with deletions and regraded as unclassified.
key_findings: The document is a National Agency Check Request form for Manuel Marti, dated June 1968.
It includes detailed personal information, including birth details, residences, employment history, and a security clearance check.
The document is linked to the JFK Assassination System and involves military intelligence (INSCOM/CSF).
Originally classified, the document was later released with some information deleted and regraded as unclassified.
